name: Infernal (itch) (BastingCrib)
description: You, the player, are tasked with shooting fire enemies to prevent them from destroying the houses behind you, while dodging the fireballs they shoot at you. The enemies occasionally drop powerup cards that you can use for extra assistance. At the end of a round, you can buy clean energy infrastructure, such as solar panels and wind turbines, to generate currency. You can also select an upgrade to mitigate wildfire risk. Afterwards, the next wave of enemies starts
